info.author: Ing. Sigurd Eckermann
info.description:
js_django_bootstrap31
=====================

Polls is a simple Django app to conduct Web-based polls. For each
question, visitors can choose between a fixed number of answers.

Detailed documentation is in the "docs" directory.

Quick start
-----------

1. Add "polls" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this::

    INSTALLED_APPS = (
        ...
        'js_django_bootstrap31',
    )

2. Include the polls URLconf in your project urls.py like this::

    url(r'^bootstrap/', include('js_django_bootstrap31.urls')),

3. Run `python manage.py migrate` to create the polls models.

4. Start the development server and visit http://127.0.0.1:8000/admin/
   to create a poll (you'll need the Admin app enabled).

5. Visit http://127.0.0.1:8000/bootstrap/ to participate in the bootstrap.

6. Examples are predefined and well tested:

http://127.0.0.1:8000/bootstrap/			- the Hello World Example
http://127.0.0.1:8000/bootstrap/basis/		- the hole basic style Examples
http://127.0.0.1:8000/bootstrap/login/		- the standard login Page
http://127.0.0.1:8000/bootstrap/navbar/		- the standard navbar
info.name: js-django-bootstrap31
info.summary: A simple Container to get Twitter Bootstrap into your project.
info.html_description:
Polls is a simple Django app to conduct Web-based polls. For each question, visitors can choose between a fixed number of answers.

Detailed documentation is in the “docs” directory.

Quick start

  1. Add “polls” to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this:

    INSTALLED_APPS = (
    ...
    'js_django_bootstrap31',
)

  2. Include the polls URLconf in your project urls.py like this:

    url(r'^bootstrap/', include('js_django_bootstrap31.urls')),

  3. Run python manage.py migrate to create the polls models.

  4. Start the development server and visit http://127.0.0.1:8000/admin/ to create a poll (you’ll need the Admin app enabled).

  5. Visit http://127.0.0.1:8000/bootstrap/ to participate in the bootstrap.

  6. Examples are predefined and well tested:

http://127.0.0.1:8000/bootstrap/ - the Hello World Example http://127.0.0.1:8000/bootstrap/basis/ - the hole basic style Examples http://127.0.0.1:8000/bootstrap/login/ - the standard login Page http://127.0.0.1:8000/bootstrap/navbar/ - the standard navbar
